name: Trapped (itch) (Anouar-Walziki)
description:
Trapped is a First person horror escape game about a teenager who was injured after a car accident. He then tries to seek help in a house nearby the crash site. He finds himself afterwards trapped inside. Sadly he discovers that the house is haunted and gets teleported to somewhere inside. So he starts his journey searching for a way out.

The game was made by me, except 3D models, some UI textures and sounds.
